question:
Consider the following statements about the Agricultural Technology Management Agency (ATMA) scheme:
  1. It aims to improve participation of women in planning & decision-making process at the district level
  2. Under this scheme, the central government provides grant-in-aid to state governments in order to facilitate farmers and self-help groups
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The major aim of the Agricultural Technology Management Agency (ATMA) is to promote decentralized farmer-driven and farmer-accountable extension system through an institutional arrangement for technology dissemination. However, it also strives for the active involvement of women at various decision-making platforms at district level like ATMA-GB & ATMA-MC & Farmer Advisory Committees at the block, district & state level. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. Under this, grant-in-aid is released to state governments to support farmers and self-help groups, especially women in their efforts of the revitalization of small business activities. It includes farmers training, demonstrations, exposure visits, Kisan Mela, Mobilization of Farmers Groups and Setting up of Farm Schools and sale of several products including organic vegetables, honey, allied products, pickles, vegetables, wheat flour, pulses etc through agricultural market, and the participants need not pay any rent to showcase their products.
